translation: The Lord dwells in the hearts of all beings, O Arjuna, causing all beings, by His illusory power, to revolve as if mounted on a machine.
commentary: 18.61 God the Lord? of all beings? in the hearts in the hearts? Arjuna Or Arjuna? Stays dwells? whirling causing to revolve? Sarvabhutani all beings? Yantrarudhani mounted on a machine? Maya by illusion.Commentary Isvara The Lord the Ruler of the universe Narayana.The Lord abides in the hearts of all beings. It is He Who has given you a gift of this marvelous machine. It is by His power
